summary: Updated all admin and vendor pages in Beauty Booking module to match design patterns from Rental module. Completed redesign of admin booking details page, updated all admin list pages (package, gift-card, retail, loyalty, subscription), and updated all vendor pages (finance, package, gift-card, retail, loyalty, subscription, badge) with consistent design patterns including proper headers, search-button-wrapper, datatable structure, and pagination.
current_status: All major design standardization tasks completed. All admin and vendor pages now follow consistent design patterns matching the Rental module structure.
